autoToggle.description: If this option is enabled then symbols-tree-view will auto open when you open files.

scrollAnimation.description: If this option is enabled then when you click the item in symbols-tree it will scroll to the destination gradually.

autoHide.description: If this option is enabled then symbols-tree-view is always hidden unless mouse hover over it.

zAutoHideTypes.title: AutoHideTypes
zAutoHideTypes.description: Here you can specify a list of types that will be hidden by default (ex: 'variable class')

sortByNameScopes.description: Here you can specify a list of scopes that will be sorted by name (ex: 'text.html.php')
